characters: Driver of a black SUV, driver of a white sedan, driver of a silver SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road with multiple lanes. The traffic is moderate, and the vehicle is maintaining a steady speed. The black SUV ahead is driving in the same lane, while a white sedan and a silver SUV are in adjacent lanes. The traffic cones on the right side indicate a construction zone or lane closure.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the black SUV ahead, approximately 20 meters away. The vehicle is also monitoring the adjacent lanes for any potential cut-ins or overtaking vehicles.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black SUV, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left: A white sedan, approximately 15 meters away, driving in the adjacent lane. 3) Right: A silver SUV, approximately 10 meters away, driving in the adjacent lane.
